titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duties on certain glass fibers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on certain fiberglass. Makes changes to the size description of such fiberglass.
